title: Kim Kardashian proudly shows off pumpkin with her and hubby Kanye West carved into it for night out
text:
While a new episode of Keeping Up With the Kardashians aired along with her E! True Hollywood Story, Kim Kardashian had a date night with husband Kanye West.

The 38 year old reality star took to her Instagram story on Sunday night, sharing several photos from The Night of the Jacks in Calabasas.

It isn't known if the happy couple brought their kids, North, Saint and Chicago, but Kardashian did share a number of photos from the event, though none of her and her family.

Date night: While a new episode of Keeping Up With the Kardashians aired along with her E! True Hollywood Story, Kim Kardashian had a date night with husband Kanye West

Pumpkin: It isn't known if the happy couple brought their kids, North, Saint and Chicago, but Kardashian did share a number of photos from the event, though none of her and her family

One of the numerous photos she shared featured a pumpkin that featured the likeness of both West and Kardashian, with Kim stating, 'Date Night at @nightsofthe jack.'

She also shared photos of similar pumpkins designed in the likeness of another Hollywood power couple, Chrissy Teigen and John Legend, with Kardashian stating 'Double Date.'

Kardashian also shared an image of two photos, one of Marilyn Monroe and the other of her star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame.

Marilyn's pumpkin: Kardashian also shared an image of two photos, one of Marilyn Monroe and the other of her star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame

She also shared a number of other photos from the Halloween-themed event, including a Nights of the Jack sign with several jack-o-lanterns around it.

She also shared an image of two skeletons riding on a wagon with roses all around them.

There was even a makeshift scarecrow with a jack-o-lantern head that was featured at Night of the Jacks.

Nights of the Jack: She also shared a number of other photos from the Halloween-themed event, including a Nights of the Jack sign with several jack-o-lanterns around it

Couple: She also shared an image of two skeletons riding on a wagon with roses all around them

Scarecrow: There was even a makeshift scarecrow with a jack-o-lantern head that was featured at Night of the Jacks

The Night of the Jacks Instagram also welcomed the Kardashians to their event, re-posting their pumpkin photo on their Instagram story.

'Oh, hello there, @kimkardashian and Kanye,' the Nights of the Jack Instagram said in their story.

Nights of the Jack is described as an, 'interactive, family friendly Halloween experience,' which runs from October 3 through November 3.

Nights IG: The Night of the Jacks Instagram also welcomed the Kardashians to their event, re-posting their pumpkin photo on their Instagram story

The new season of Keeping Up With the Kardashians is airing every Sunday night on E! with the True Hollywood Story of Kim airing this Sunday.

The reality star and her husband spent the weekend in Washington D.C., where they spoke at Howard University and Kanye held a listening party for his new album Jesus Is King.

The album was supposed to drop on September 29 but it was delayed and no release date has been confirmed yet.

New season: The new season of Keeping Up With the Kardashians is airing every Sunday night on E! with the True Hollywood Story of Kim airing this Sunday

Reality: The reality star and her husband spent the weekend in Washington D.C., where they spoke at Howard University and Kanye held a listening party for his new album Jesus Is King
description: While a new episode of Keeping Up With the Kardashians aired along with her E! True Hollywood Story, Kim Kardashian had a date night with husband Kanye West.
